data.event: Fairfield and much of its surrounding township, Alexander, is now covered by water, as part of the Harry S. Truman Dam and Reservoir.
He arrived in Fairfield in 1832 and purchased an Indian village for $60.

event.title: obtained a ferry license for the Pomme de Terre River at that spot in 1836

data.event: He obtained a ferry license for the Pomme de Terre River at that spot in 1836 and was elected as a county judge.
